pages.text: Say My verit v GOD do co sent us v co sent nadol Abraham Ismail Isaac Jacob Patriarchs v co dat Moses Jesus prophets ich Lord My nie robit distinction any z them. Do Him alone my bol submitters
Ktokolvek accepts Submission jeho nabozenstvo it nie accepted him Hereafter he bol losers
Why GOD guide ludia should disbelieved after verit after svedok posol bol truth a solid proofs dat them? GOD NIE guide the ZLOMYSELNY
These incurred condemnation GOD angels all ludia
Eternally they abide therein; retribution never zmenit them nor will they reprieved
Exempted bol those kto repent thereafter reform GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
Those disbelieve verit potom plunge deeper disbelief ich repentance nie accepted them; they bol real strayers
Those disbelieve umrel disbelievers earthful zlaty will nie accepted any z them vecer such ransom bol possible They incurred painful retribution; they nie have helpers
